input_args.passage: 'Cerdic of Wessex | Cerdic was the Saxon leader defeated by the Britons at the Battle of Mount Badon, probably fought in 490 (and possibly later, but not later than ...'
input_args.claim: 'Combining these two pieces of information, it can be inferred that the army that was defeated by the West Saxon forces led by Cerdic and Cynric of the Gewisse was the Britons.'
